name: copytrade-pro
description: Professional trading application with multi-broker support

scripts.install:all: npm run install:dev-packages && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:e2e
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.build:quick: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend:quick && npm run copy:frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:e2e
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:all:backend && npm run clean:all:frontend && npm run clean:all:e2e && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
scripts.reset: npm run clean:all && npm run install:all
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.build:dev-packages: npm run build:dev-packages:shared-types && npm run build:dev-packages:unified-broker && npm run build:dev-packages:broker-shoonya && npm run build:dev-packages:broker-fyers
scripts.clean:dev-packages: cd dev-packages/shared-types && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../unified-broker && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../broker-shoonya && rm -rf dist node_modules && cd ../broker-fyers && rm -rf dist node_modules
scripts.install:dev-packages: cd dev-packages/shared-types && npm install && npm run build && cd ../unified-broker && npm install && npm run build && cd ../broker-shoonya && npm install && npm run build && cd ../broker-fyers && npm install && npm run build
scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'âœ… Setup complete! Run npm run dev to start development servers'
scripts.setup:fresh: npm run clean:all && npm run setup
scripts.verify: npm run verify:dev-packages && npm run verify:backend && npm run verify:frontend && npm run verify:e2e
scripts.verify:dev-packages: cd dev-packages/shared-types && npm ls && cd ../unified-broker && npm ls && cd ../broker-shoonya && npm ls && cd ../broker-fyers && npm ls
scripts.check-deps: npm run check-deps:backend && npm run check-deps:frontend

author: Raviteja Kamalapuram
